entry.title: segwit naming ambiguity
entry.summary: The email asks a question to OG bitcoin API designers about the function `is_segwit()` and whether it would return `true` or `false` for a p2tr transaction. The sender mentions that currently they are using `v0` but find it ugly. They inquire if there is an official or widely used name for segwit v0. The email is signed by Tobin.
